Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class RegularPaddle

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.Paddle
project.chenlin_17.Views.RegularPaddle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
class RegularPaddle extends Paddle
This class contains the model for the geometric rectangle paddle and extends the paddle class.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN
Note
It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularPaddle

      public RegularPaddle(javafx.geometry.Point2D ballPoint, int width, int height, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle container, javafx.scene.Group group)
      This constructor creates the regular paddle type, whose viewing is expected to be a rectangle.
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - paddle's start point
      width - defined paddle width
      height - defined paddle height
      container - defined paddle movement range
      group - expected viewing group

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      width - paddle width
      height - paddle height
      Returns:
      built rectangle paddle with defined width and height.
